history.proof: intros n st src t v. unfold handleRequestVoteReply. destruct (currentTerm st <? t) eqn:E1. - simpl. srun best use: advanceCurrentTerm_clientCache. - destruct (t <? currentTerm st) eqn:E2. + reflexivity. + unfold wonElection. simpl. qsimpl use: handleRequestVoteReply_log_rewrite.

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.exn: In environment orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params n : name st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output src : name t : nat v : bool E1 : (currentTerm st <? t) = true Unable to unify "clientCache st" with "clientCache (advanceCurrentTerm st t)".

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.tactic: destruct (voteGranted && bool_recognize (dedup name_eq_dec (src :: votesReceived st))) eqn:E3.
exceptions.exn: The reference voteGranted was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros n st src t v.
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "log (handleRequestVoteReply ?M1645 ?M1646 ?M1647 ?M1648 ?M1649)" in the current goal.

ctx: intros n st src t v.

original: intros n st src t v. simpl. unfold handleRequestVoteReply. destruct (currentTerm st <? t) eqn:E1. - simpl. reflexivity. - destruct (t <? currentTerm st) eqn:E2. + simpl. reflexivity. + unfold wonElection. destruct (voteGranted && bool_recognize (dedup name_eq_dec (src :: votesReceived st))) eqn:E3. * simpl. rewrite handleRequestVoteReply_log_rewrite. reflexivity. * simpl. rewrite handleRequestVoteReply_log_rewrite. reflexivity.
